short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the number of unread items in your Netvibes account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.2:
 - Multiple feeds support
 - Secure feeds support
 - Options page to select a dashboard

Version 0.1:
 - Displays the number of unread items in your feeds
